name: Hallway 1
short_description: You are in a long hallway.
long_description:
You enter a long, bright, and sterile hallway.
There is an awkward man in an Auriga uniform frantically
searching his pockets when, suddenly he looks up to see
you and fear spreads across his face.
You enter a long hallway, and see Jim pacing back and forth mumbling to himself

You enter a long hallway, and Jim is sitting on the floor near the entrance
to the testing hangar

You enter a hallway and...
[JIM] Huh? What? Who's there?
[JIM] Oh geez Auriga-7B! You scared me!

You enter a long sterile hallway. Jim is standing with his hands in his pockets,
still wondering where he left his badge.

You enter a long sterile hallway.
[JIM] I hope they don't fire me for losing my badge! I like talking to all of you
[JIM] robots. Escpecially you Auriga-7B
